00025 namespace brics_3d {

00031 class ObjectModelCylinder : public IObjectModelUsingNormals {
00032 
00033 public:
00034         ObjectModelCylinder(){};
00035         virtual ~ObjectModelCylinder(){};
00036 
00037         void getSamples (int &iterations, std::vector<int> &samples);
00038         bool computeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &samples, Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients);
00039         void optimizeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &inliers, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00040                         Eigen::VectorXd &optimized_coefficients);
00041         void getDistancesToModel (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, std::vector<double> &distances);
00042         void selectWithinDistance (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, double threshold,
00043                         std::vector<int> &inliers);
00044         void getInlierDistance (std::vector<int> &inliers, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00045                         std::vector<double> &distances);
00046         void projectPoints (const std::vector<int> &inliers, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00047                         PointCloud3D* projectedPointCloud);
00048         bool doSamplesVerifyModel (const std::set<int> &indices, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00049                         double threshold);
00050         void computeRandomModel (int &iterations, Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, bool &isDegenerate, bool &modelFound);
00051 
00052         inline int getNumberOfSamplesRequired(){return 3;};
00053 
00054 protected:
00059         double
00060         pointToLineDistance (const Eigen::Vector4d &pt, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients);
00061 
00067         double
00068         pointToLineDistance (const Eigen::Vector4d &pt, const Eigen::Vector4d &line_pt,
00069                         const Eigen::Vector4d &line_dir);
00070 
00077         inline void
00078         projectPointToLine (const Eigen::Vector4d &pt, const Eigen::Vector4d &line_pt, const Eigen::Vector4d &line_dir,
00079                         Eigen::Vector4d &pt_proj)
00080         {
00081                 double k = (pt.dot (line_dir) - line_pt.dot (line_dir)) / line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00082                 // Calculate the projection of the point on the line
00083                 pt_proj = line_pt + k * line_dir;
00084         }
00085 
00092         inline void
00093         projectPointToCylinder(const Eigen::Vector4d &pt, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00094                         Eigen::Vector4d &pt_proj)
00095         {
00096                 Eigen::Vector4d line_pt  (model_coefficients[0], model_coefficients[1], model_coefficients[2], 0);
00097                 Eigen::Vector4d line_dir (model_coefficients[3], model_coefficients[4], model_coefficients[5], 0);
00098 
00099                 double k = (pt.dot (line_dir) - line_pt.dot (line_dir)) * line_dir.dot (line_dir);
00100                 pt_proj = line_pt + k * line_dir;
00101 
00102                 Eigen::Vector4d dir = pt - pt_proj;
00103                 dir.normalize ();
00104 
00105                 // Calculate the projection of the point onto the cylinder
00106                 pt_proj += dir * model_coefficients[6];
00107         }
00108 
00109 
00110 };
00111 
00112 }
